seo.title: Things to Do in Corniglia 2025 | Activities & Experiences
seo.description: Best activities in Corniglia. Hiking, wine tasting, photography, local cuisine, village exploring, and authentic experiences.

body.title: Things to Do
body.subtitle: Hiking, wine tasting, village exploring, and experiencing authentic local life.

features.title: Climb the Lardarina
features.description: Conquer the famous 382 steps from the train station. A Cinque Terre rite of passage.

features.title: Wine Tasting
features.description: Sample local Vernaccia at village enotecas. Learn about ancient winemaking traditions.

features.title: Coastal Hiking
features.description: Hike to Vernazza or Manarola on spectacular trails. Central location for all routes.

features.title: Photography
features.description: Capture panoramic views from terraces. Vineyard terraces create stunning compositions.

features.title: Culinary Experience
features.description: Dine at authentic trattorias. Taste traditional Ligurian recipes at family restaurants.

features.title: Sunset Views
features.description: Watch sunset from Belvedere terrace. See the coastline bathed in golden light.
